title: User
description: Schema for user documents in Firestore

birthdate.description: The user's birthdate as a timestamp string

favorite_color.description: The user's favorite color in hex format

created_time.description: The time when the user account was created

display_name.description: The display name of the user

email.description: The email address of the user

photo_url.description: The URL of the user's profile photo

uid.description: The unique identifier of the user
